long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will use Text-to-Speech to read out what is being discussed on a reddit thread. Especially fun when used on live sport threads.

How to use:
- Browse to the thread you want to listen to, for example: https://www.reddit.com/r/soccer/comments/eh648m/match_thread_arsenal_vs_chelsea_premier_league/
- Change reddit.com to reddit-stream.com
- Press icon in extension toolbar and play!

More options:
- Select maximum posts to read at every update.
- Select which voice synthesizer to use (for example English, Italian, French...)
